Html: I'm working on a project which involves a bunch of external Dll. I have wrappers around these Dlls and have a bunch of API calls I would like to get at through a custom language, where would I start to look/ what challenges might I face if I were to try and glue in custom commands in this way?

Even from a basic point of view if I want to wire a simple command such a:

print("Hello World")

So it was linked to C#'s:

MessageBox.Show()

Being able to do that would probably give me some clues as to how I might wire in my API commands.

Have a look at this article:
http://intellect.dk/post/Writing-a-calculator-in-C-using-Irony.aspx

it shows how to add calls to selected math functions inside expressions, custom impl of FunctionCallNode
That looks like it might do the trick. Thanks, I'll get back to you to tell you how it goes.
